name: projeto-bigtech
description: Plataforma SaaS multi-tenant para consultas de dados

scripts.e2e:up: docker compose -f appwrite/docker-compose.yml up -d && docker compose -f infrastructure/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml up -d
scripts.e2e:down: docker compose -f infrastructure/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml down && docker compose -f appwrite/docker-compose.yml down
scripts.e2e:test: npm --prefix backend test && npm --prefix frontend-app test || true
scripts.e2e:run: npm run e2e:up && sleep 8 && npm run e2e:test && npm run e2e:down
